alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 02 at 2:36AM MST until January 03 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MST /1 PM PST/ TO 11 PM MST /10 PM PST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Oregon, southern Harney and southern Malheur Counties. In Idaho, Owyhee Mountains. * WHEN...From 2 PM MST /1 PM PST/ to 11 PM MST /10 PM PST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow unsecured objects around. Tree limbs could be blown down and power outages may result. Winds will cause blowing and drifting of snow and will reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
